attributes.action: concerned people wishing to leave what used to be great britian
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we have many thouands of immagrants from all walks of life entering the uk daily,yet familys and indaviduals wishing to pursue a new life abroad are getting stopped. WHY. When all we want is a new and better life for our familes yet Labour is stopping this and not helping.

rejection.details: The petition is unclear and also contains references to party political material.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
